document.full_text: taking the novartis cancer drug gleevec for three years following surgery to remove gastrointestinal stromal tumors (gist) extended survival in more high-risk patients than the standard one year of gleevec treatment, according to data released on sunday.
document.title: longer gleevec use extends gist patient survival
